name: A Clear Problem
description:
A Clear Problem is a small linear adventure about a kid helping people make sustainable change. Talk to the locals and help them defeat the evil that plagues their small island.

Explore the Island using WASD to move around and SPACE to jump!

Use the E KEY to interact with objects and Talk to npcs. Sometimes it takes a while for the button to register an input, be patient and hit a couple times but don't mash it please!

A game made with Unity BOLT in 3 days, by:

Carlos Javier Granados & Luca Macedo

For the ESNE GAME JamOn 2021

Themed around Sustainable Development Objectives
